example_modid.msg: Custom msg on crash for this mod id. You can use $JAR_NAME$ placeholder, which will be replaced with jar name. You can use HTML here, it will work.

advancementscreenshot.msg:
A completely different and better implementation of the features from Advancement Screenshot already exists in Universal Tweaks.
Fix: Delete $JAR_NAME$ from the mods folder.

customspawner.msg: Custom Mob Spawner is very outdated and WILL screw up mob spawns in many mods. If you are using Mo' Creatures, it is highly recommended to use Mo' Creatures Extended instead which removes the dependency.

essential.msg:
Essential Mod has questionable implementation that makes it incompatible with several mods including CensoredASM and Forgelin-Continuous. It is recommended to use e4mc Retro (Proxy) or Lan UPNP (Non-Proxy) instead for a more simpler alternative.
Fix: Delete $JAR_NAME$ from the mods folder. If you're not sure how Essential Mod got installed, a mod you downloaded may be potentially installing it.
